title: Can't make it past loading screen.
body:
As title states, can't make it past loading screen without crashing. On top of that--I get penalties because of it. So I pay the price and then some for something I have no control over. I started it as admin, uninstalled>reinstalled and then ran as admin--still kapoot.

I have to wait 20 minutes to crash. What is going on?

replies.body: Hey, that sucks and I want to help!  When you say crash what's happening exactly?  Are there any error messages, and what does it say?

> [{quoted}](name=Porocles,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=xvo0oHwe,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2017-12-09T23:38:48.214+0000)
>
> Hey, that sucks and I want to help!  When you say crash what's happening exactly?  Are there any error messages, and what does it say?

Literally just gives me a bug splat pop up with the Hiem skin.

It would start but then go black before crashing down completely.

Thanks for the info!  In this case it sounds like something is failing to render the game, possible bad game files or drivers.  The steps in the [game crash](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974-Bug-Splat-and-Game-Crashes+) guide should help fix things up!
